text:
Going on Fox 5 NY Good Day New York at 7:10 AM. 

I love their show but I’m still a little salty they don’t call it Good Day NJ.
@Paul_S87 @SABALegal Great meeting you too!

There are over 2,000 children who aren’t with their parents right now because we separated them. There are no plans in place for reunification. We have to be better than this. #FamiliesBelongTogether
https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1013555474317406213 QT @nowthisnews 'When we have children being housed in cages crying for their mommies and daddies, we know we are better than this.' — Watch Kamala Harris' powerful call to keep families together http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1013553357649215489/img/r12ld1vhElGiBRQp.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1013553357649215489/vid/240x240/CGQwiTByHzib-5Pr.mp4?tag=3

Glad to be in Leitchfield, KY this morning giving an update on my work in the Senate. Highlighting things like my Penny Plan and ongoing efforts to address Washington’s spending problem. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhHFYy1WAAErNTW.jpg
My statement on the election of Andrés Manuel López Obrador as President of #Mexico. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=FDB0F90B-3626-4074-99ED-914AFC57FFF2

I regularly work across the aisle to deliver for NJ. 

Please call @ghelmy I’m my office for a list of some wins 973 639 8700. 

As for our President. I will never cease in calling him out for how he hurts New Jersey (ending SALT, threatening critics infrastructure funding, etc). https://twitter.com/bk00023/status/1013770707808018432 QT @bk00023 @CoryBooker You actually don’t listen to your critics from #nj .. we want you to stop yelling & work with Trump .. so much can be accomplished.

And you are nothing more than a incredible soul created in the image of the divine. Though we don’t agree on policy, I will never demean you personally. I sincerely wish you the best. https://twitter.com/jerryiles1/status/1013745990497644544 QT @jerryiles1 @CoryBooker Cory, you are nothing more than a “angry black man”. You haven’t the temperament for any politically held position!
You are a truth teller. https://twitter.com/nanna14075/status/1013740390619414529 QT @nanna14075 @CoryBooker I for one, am fully aware that the @buffalobills are NY's only team. ☺️

I know from personal experience — as a beneficiary of the landmark Brown vs. Board ruling desegregating our nation’s schools — that decisions handed down by the Court touch every aspect of our lives. The stakes don’t get any higher with this SCOTUS vacancy.

Actually I don’t. I openly criticized the poor treatment before Trump was elected. And I hope you will take time to look at the data around GDP contributions of Dreamers and the undocumented. The 2013 bipartisan immigration reform bill would have added billions to our economy. https://twitter.com/bgc1954/status/1013745903310647297 QT @bgc1954 @CoryBooker You need a history lesson, particularly as it relates to the Obama/Holder years and the treatment of illegals, including children, at the border. And, apparently, a lesson in economics.

So grateful to be coming on Pix 11 at 8:05 AM. 

See you in a few mins. Anybody want coffee? https://twitter.com/pix11news/status/1013749675395112960 QT @PIX11News COMING UP: NJ Senator @CoryBooker on 'Families Belong Together' marches & Trump's SCOTUS picks. Watch at 8:15a. https://pix11.com/live
That would be fair. https://twitter.com/vicvjr/status/1013740307781947392 QT @VicVJr @CoryBooker "Good Day Tri-State"

@Gokzarah Not necessary. All the best to you.
@anthonyhesse Hope you catch up. I’m one of only 6 US Senators that doesn’t take corporate contributions.

RT @ericswalwell Trump's policies are putting us in a trade war with allies like Canada. There are no winners here. American farmers are suffering because of Trump's ego.  
https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2018/07/canada-imposes-massive-new-tariffs-on-american-goods/

@MaitriButcher Anger is a very constructive emotion. Hate is a destructive emotion. 

I think we agree here. All the best to you.

My record speaks for itself: 
→ Arrested members of drug trafficking organizations that smuggled in narcotics to the United States
→ Announced the arrests in a murder-for-hire plot by a Tijuana-based drug cartel
→ Confiscated 500lbs of meth from a Mexican cartel
@hammerschlogin One of my great life mentors was named Virginia Jones. I wrote a chapter about her in my book United. All the best to you.

I love you and am a fellow Giants fan but you know the Giants play in Jersey right? https://twitter.com/randy_in_ct/status/1013738231316303873 QT @Randy_in_CT @CoryBooker I'm a New York Giants fan. Don't be a hater!

It's time to reduce the heavy burden of student debt that is weighing down the lives of millions of former college students and make public colleges and universities tuition-free. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1012093679971065859/img/OMQ-PVFLmTuIn6eQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1012093679971065859/vid/240x240/ieJnsfnOV-KgajMI.mp4?tag=3

No parent should have to worry about outrageous medical bills while their child is sick. We must pass Medicare for all so that health care is a right for all people in America, not a privilege for a few who can afford it. https://twitter.com/dsam4a/status/1012697192455290880 QT @dsam4a The UK's National Health Service spared @robdelaney's family from financial stress while they endured the grief of losing their son. 

Now, a week before the NHS's 70th anniversary, he encourages fellow Americans to get involved in the fight for Medicare for All: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dg11eASUEAIt5Nv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1012590520013451265/vid/240x240/4IR1Ks6u19MTZDqt.mp4?tag=3
Love back to you. https://twitter.com/manateesb4/status/1013747149312536576 QT @manateesb4 @CoryBooker Class...and wonderfully tactful, mild temperament.  Love my senator.

President Trump has already made this clear in the past on numerous occasions—he wants to nominate someone to the Supreme Court who will overturn Roe v. Wade & end a woman’s right to choose. This is about punishing women for wanting to control their lives. https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2018/06/the-coming-battle-to-overturn-roe-v-wade/563936/

I’m sorry u actually believe that. This administration put into affect 1 of the cruelest US policies of the last century. This administration ended DACA. This administration is making us less safe and less economically secure by using fear as a weapon against our communities. https://twitter.com/callofdoodie/status/1013738173862641666 QT @callofdoodie @CoryBooker Are you going to discuss why the Democrats keep voting against an immigration bills that will keep families together? 2 bills so far... #Hypocrites
Was proud to stand with advocates and activists like @chadwickboseman to fight for immigrant children and their families. #FamiliesBelongTogether http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhHPjcbWkAA5dL9.jpg
Thank you to the US Capitol Police for their arrest of the man who recently threatened to kill my family and me.

Congratulations to @lopezobrador_ and the people of Mexico. Our countries must work together to create a continent which creates economic, social, racial and environmental justice instead of divisiveness and xenophobia.
Mi declaración tras la elección de Andrés Manuel López Obrador como Presidente de #México. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=FDB0F90B-3626-4074-99ED-914AFC57FFF2

Thank you for encouraging me today. 

I so appreciate your kindness. https://twitter.com/microwoman/status/1013764624947273728 QT @microwoman @CoryBooker Cory Booker, you're an incredible man !!  You bring humanity to politics. Thank you for all you do to help all the people of the United States!!

RT @BrookingsInst “There is no reason that a country as rich and as powerful as ours should have to choose between great wealth for the few and great opportunity for all of its citizens.” @CoryBooker explores how to renew the American Dream: https://www.brookings.edu/essay/senator-booker-american-dream-deferred/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=essay20 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhD95IhW4AA06Cs.jpg
@ShivaniHonwad So good seeing you twice!
@hsojlightfoot We agree! I will fight.

@TZeliznak I hope you take time to check out the bipartisan bills I’ve passed and my record in Newark working with Chris Christie and other Republicans. 

All the best to you.
@reallyruth Gratitude to you. No two Americans will agree on everything but we can always be kind to each other. Thank you for your kindness this morning.

I agree! And it starts with us.

If you want more kindness in the world: 

be more kind. 

If you want more love in the world:

be more loving.

If you want more hope in the world:

 be an agent of hope in another’s life. 

1 small ray of light can lead the world out of darkness. https://twitter.com/ksl_mann/status/1013764442520276998 QT @ksl_mann @CoryBooker Thank you!!  The civility is gone!  We must get it back & our country!

RT @PatrickSvitek .@TedCruz returning to campaign trail for week of July Fourth, joining @TexasCruzer for stops in College Station, Waco, Sulphur Springs, Jefferson, Nacogdoches and Kountze: https://www.eventbrite.com/o/ted-cruz-for-senate-8321610348 #txsen

An airline employee making less than he has in 20 years. @CoryBooker shares real stories of working-class Americans struggling to get by:  https://www.brookings.edu/essay/senator-booker-american-dream-deferred/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=essay20 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhGi7OGWAAEw8Wu.jpg

Proud to see San Francisco joining cities and states across our country moving forward to make the minimum wage a living wage. The federal minimum wage is too low, and it's not enough to support a family — we must establish a living wage nationwide.
http://www.ktvu.com/news/san-francisco-minimum-wage-increases-to-15-an-hour-on-sunday

Thanks for looking out. 

One may benefit (especially us elected) from listening to critics with an open heart even if they intend to mock u or discourage ur spirit. 

And there’s always benefit to responding with kindness: the only way to truly counter dark energy is with light. https://twitter.com/hsojlightfoot/status/1013764797400305664 QT @hsojlightfoot @CoryBooker How do you respond to Trump trolls? He barely even has 17 followers. Not worth your time. I'm sure he wanted to use another word than "angry black man"! 

These people aren't worth talking with.

I want to thank all the supporters, volunteers, and Vermonters who joined us Saturday in Waterbury for their annual Independence Day Parade. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhG3eNuW4AE9fsi.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhG3eP6W0AIvsae.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhG3eNtX4AAqiZB.jpg

This Supreme Court has repeatedly sided with employers over employees, corporations over consumers, and special interests over vulnerable Americans. We can’t afford to fill its vacancy with another Justice who will fail to uphold the rights of Americans.
https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2018/07/big-business-keeps-winning-at-the-supreme-court/564260/
@rodneyeason We sincerely need to focus on the midterms in November before we turn our energy toward 2020. But thank you for the encouraging energy.

Unions built America’s middle class, & unions will rebuild it. This weekend, I joined union workers and their families on the picket line outside @nationalgridus. They’re fighting for better wages & health care coverage. @Steelworkers don’t back down – I’m with them all the way. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhH1AMbWAAAFLAv.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhH1AMcXcAEup6Q.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhH1AMlX0AIlbd5.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhH1AMcXcAAv-Xj.jpg

We need to create an economy that works for everyone, not just the few. https://www.washingtonpost.com/amphtml/news/wonk/wp/2018/06/25/trump-tea

No matter what they say, I will never stop fighting to hold Trump and his Administration accountable and I will never stop speaking out against their immoral policies like separating parents from their families. Add your name to stand by me:
https://action.kamalaharris.org/sign/180702-white-house-attack-tw-petition/

“I became convinced that noncooperation with evil is as much a moral obligation as cooperation with good.” -Martin Luther King, Jr. #MondayMotivation

You hate discipline;you cast my words behind you! If you see a thief,you run with him;with adulterers you throw in your lot. You give your mouth free rein for evil;you yoke your tongue to deceit. You sit & speak against your brother,slandering your mother’s son. Psalms 50: 17-20
@c_shawnell Amen! And thank you.

If you know of someone who hasn't registered to vote or hasn't committed, have them visit this website. Our democracy is at stake → https://iwillvote.com/

Being a woman was considered a pre-existing condition. 

Not anymore. That has all changed thanks to the Affordable Care Act. 

Learn more about the harm Republican leaders want to cause 👇

https://www.americanprogress.org/issues/healthcare/news/2018/06/29/453011/latest-aca-repeal-plan-harm-women/
@BennKeezy You are a generous soul.

Paul Ryan and Donald Trump promised Americans that their wages would increase after passing the #GOPTaxScam. 

Well, wages haven’t gone up. But health care premiums and prescription drugs prices have. 

Democrats’ #ABetterDeal fixes that. Learn more 👇
